pages.text: Now we craft a generator and a battery box and place them next to each other. Note that the side with the dot on the battery box is energy output, all other sides are energy input. Put the remaining cable on the output side.

Next up are the iron furnace and the iron alloy furnace. The iron furnace saves your smelting XP and has a better yield than the vanilla furnace, and the iron alloy furnace is needed to craft the wrench. For that, put the 3 remaining copper ingots and the tin ingot into the alloy furnace to get 4 bronze ingots.
The wrench can be used to change orientations of machines or to make the blocks drop. Now that the set-up is done, we are ready for the machines!
